name: Soul Slayer
storyline: The soul world has changed. The Soul King and his minions are a danger to peaceful souls and the human world. A few brave souls try to protect them and restore order in the soul world. Those beings who carry the same ambition unite under the title of the Soul Slayer.
summary: A unique take on the bullet hell survivor genre. Unlock, equip, upgrade and create your build. Combine different elements for their powerful element reactions and slay thousands of enemies. Are you able to defeat all Soul Lords and the Soul King?
